name: OutputPortLocator
description:
draw2d.layout.locator.OutputPortLocator

Repositions a Figure attached to a Connection when the Connection is moved. Provides for alignment at the start (source), middle, or end (target) of the Connection.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Default constructor for a Locator which can layout a port in context of a {@link draw2d.shape.node.Node}

functions.name: relocate
functions.description: Controls the location of an I{@link draw2d.Figure}
